name: BLAST - Classic Free Helicopter Adventure
description:
BLAST OFF!

High Paced Action Adventure Addictive Unending Game!

BOOST your way through space on Three Unlock-able Ships! Color matches the IPhone 5C's diversity of Colors!

BLUE, RED, GREEN, GOLD, WHITE!

Multiple Difficult Achievements!
Challenge your Friends on GameCenter!
GameCenter High Score Challenge!
Twitter High Score Challenge!

Every Thursday get bonus ORBS! 2X Orbs on Thursdays!



Have a BLAST!
GET BLASTED!

Try this unique Arcade Game today on your IPad or IPhone!

Check out our other Apps! www.AerApps.com
